isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - HOOD SEALS

svcsubproc.title: 9300 and 9400 Hood Seals - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 20 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and tilt the hood to the full open position.
Drill out the rivets (Item 2) using a 9/64 inch (3.56 mm) drill bit. Remove the hood seal (Item 1) from the cowl flange (Item 3). Save the hood seal for installation, if not damaged.
Check the hood seal (Item 1) for cracks and tears. If damaged, replace it.
Position the new hood seal (Item 1) on the cowl flange (Item 3) and secure with 1/8 inch (3 mm) diameter, 3/8 to 7/16 inch (9.53 to 11 mm) grip range blind rivets (Item 2).
Close the hood and fasten the hood latches.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SFA Hood Seals/5000 SBA Hood Seals (After August 1994) - Remove

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and tilt the hood to the full open position.
Drill out the rivets (Item 2) using a 9/64 inch (3.56 mm) drill bit. Remove the hood seal (Item 1) from the cowl flange (Item 3). Save the hood seal for installation, if not damaged..

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SFA Hood Seals/5000 SBA Hood Seals (After August 1994) - Install

step1.para: Check the hood seal (Item 1) for cracks and tears. If damaged, replace it.
Position the new hood seal (Item 1) on the cowl flange (Item 3) and secure with 1/8 inch (3 mm) diameter, 3/8 to 7/16 inch (9.53 to 11 mm) grip range blind rivets (Item 2).
Close the hood and fasten the hood latches.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA Hood Seals With Butterfly Hood (Optional After August 1994) - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 20 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Release the hood latches on each side of the hood and raise the left or right side hood to the open position, as required.

Drill out the rivets (Item 2) using a 9/64 inch (3.56 mm) drill bit. Remove the left and right side hood seals (Item 1) from the cowl flange (Item 3). Save the hood seals for installation, if not damaged.

Remove 1 screw and flat washer (Item 5) at the bottom of the left and right side hood seals (Item 1), then remove them by carefully pulling on the hood seals at each of the push-in fasteners to remove them from the radiator shell flange (Item 4). Save the screw and flat washer, push-in fasteners and hood seals for installation, if not damaged.

svcsubproc.title: 5000 SBA Hood Seals With Butterfly Hood (Optional After August 1994) - Install

step1.para: Check the hood seals (Item 1) for cracks and tears. If damaged, replace them.
Position the left and right side hood seals (Item 1) on the cowl flange (Item 3) and secure with 1/8 inch (3 mm) diameter, 3/8 to 7/16 inch (9.53 to 11 mm) grip range blind rivets (Item 2).

Position the left and right side hood seals (Item 1) on the radiator shell flange (Item 4) and secure with the push-in fasteners, then install 1 screw and flat washer (Item 5) at the bottom of each hood seal.
Close the hood and fasten the hood latches.
